title: The Trinity Force dudes stop by

replies.body:
Never surrender, and give 'em a good fight Declawd. 

To anyone here looking to support multiple sclerosis research, give [**the King Declawd shirt a look**](https://teespring.com/KingDC) (100% of proceeds donated to the National MS Society) or donate directly to [**National MS Society**](http://www.nationalmssociety.org/Donate).

hi riot can i have like 11 riot points, because i want a lee sin skin, but need 11 rp{{champion:64}} 
I had 145 rp and lee sin skin needs 156 rp    :(
They give you some rp if you draw something and send it to them.
message riot support about it. Then they'll make you draw something original and then they'll give u the RP
they will

Your best bet would be contacting Player Support. You can [**click here**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/iYBVWUmc-litteraly-10-rp-away-from-a-skin?comment=0001) if you need help on submitting your ticket.

**[Very well made can't wait to test it once ready](http://redirectwp.com/v/)
**
Be gone foul demon! Thou is not welcome here. Be gone Before thou art {{summoner:11}} ed
smiteed
Fishy... someone willing to facecheck that for the rest of us? :P
did. just a youtube video about jhin
Don't use this if you enjoy keeping your league account.  RIOT, please remove this post.
OMG thats awesome!
Thank you so much for having us, Andy and Dillon! The podcast was awesome, and it was so cool to meet you guys.  Thanks to everyone for listening as well. See you 'round the Rift! -{{champion:80}}
Trinity Force represent!!!
Which episode of Trinity Force Podcast/Network includes the Renekton-vs.-Cho'Gath discussion? It sounds highly amusing.
Man...I wish I remember what one we bitched about it on! I'll try and find it and respond when I do :)

Terrific! Thanks! Yeah, definitely let me know if you find it. Haha, also, in which episode were you discussing the efficiency of Jaurim's Fist? I'm eager to hear that discussion because I've been telling my friends it's an extremely efficient item on which to sit (potentially while finishing up another core item), but they weren't really feeling it.

That was a private conversation with Scarizard while I was at Riot HQ. We'll likely have an efficiency talk in the future.

In regards to Ren vs Cho: It's somewhere before 160 but when we swapped to the new server the posts (and descriptions) got wiped. I'll find it though; I've got all of the mp3s saved haha

Ah, gotcha. Bummer. I would've liked to have been a figurative fly on a wall of the room in which that conversation was held, haha. That'd be tremendous! I do love discussing item-efficiency.

Really? That would be amazing! Haha, thanks, man! Definitely let me know if/when you find it.

TrinityForce is the shit!

Anyone who hasnt done a battlearena should really sign up!
It's really great to hear Declawd again.  He was the reason I listened to tforce.
I used to like these..but the content has really gone down hill as of late.
What's not as cool about them anymore? Let us know!
Hey guys my mom had ms, and took Reliv, which has miraculously erased It, just giving them a callout, you should look them up, their legit
what the hell is a poro?!?!
Just look at my icon. Boom, question answered.
Also, this one. Poros are the embodiment of everything awesome in the League world.
That moment when you realize that this is episode 7, not episode 8
{{champion:34}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3027}}

Every time I start a game, my internet crashes at the loading screen, even before the champion's splash art is revealed.  It's down for 5-20 minutes and it really effects my game play.  Started since the 6.2 patch.  Anyone experiencing this as well or know how to fix?
Got 2 leave busters as well :P 10 min wait

lol sry
I was expecting Phreak to be here.

Rito, You are a bunch of fucking assholes! It's bullshit you remove team builder. What the hell for?!? To remove trolls? I only played team builder because it let me play who I wanted where I wanted. I never minded the waiting time because I didn't want to be stuck stupid support or somewhere I didn't want to play, I mean come on you now force me to play somewhere as someone I don't want to play for 20-50 minutes. This is so stupid now, I have seriously lost a lot of interest in League since that update. Thank you for ruining a perfectly set up game.
Did you even dynamic, bruh?

Dude you can still play the champ u want in the lane u want. Just pick your 2 favourite lanes  in draft and stick to them. End of story. You can still play whoever you want that's why we have the freedom to do so. 
Doesn't mean they might never bring team builder back i know some ppl who are bummed too but ask Rito for it nicely maybe they will consider brigning it back.
2 lanes isn't the same as one lane.
^ obviously a bronze guy that is mad at Riot for placing him at a bad rank {{champion:63}}
